hibernate-mapping.query: DELETE FROM OnlineSurveyContentAnswer online WHERE online.onlineSurveyContent.id IN(:requestionId)
SELECT online.id, online.answer, online.voteCount FROM OnlineSurveyContentAnswer online WHERE online.onlineSurveyContent.id = :questionId

SELECT online.id, online.onlineSurveyContent.onlineSurvey.name, online.onlineSurveyContent.name, SUM(online.voteCount), online.onlineSurveyContent.id FROM OnlineSurveyContentAnswer online GROUP BY online.onlineSurveyContent.id
UPDATE OnlineSurveyContentAnswer online SET online.voteCount = online.voteCount+1 WHERE online.id IN(:answerIds)
SELECT SUM(online.voteCount) FROM OnlineSurveyContentAnswer online WHERE online.onlineSurveyContent.id = :questionId
SELECT online.id FROM OnlineSurveyContentAnswer online WHERE online.onlineSurveyContent.id = :id
